entry.title: Love this app!!
entry.content: This is an awesome app!!! I use it all the time. So user friendly and adds such a cool dimension to just ordinary photos. Highly recommended!!

Love this app!!

This is an awesome app!!! I use it all the time. So user friendly and adds such a cool dimension to just ordinary photos. Highly recommended!!

entry.title: Worth downloading:)
entry.content: My first-choice photo editing app of all time. Easy to use and no disturbing in-app purchase unless you tap on the new features.

entry.title: In-app Purchases Lost
entry.content: The app was great. Among other similar apps, I used it most for photo editing in my iPhone. But very disappointed, I lost some in-app purchases after upgrading to the latest release. Not much support is provided by the developer.

In-app Purchases Lost

The app was great. Among other similar apps, I used it most for photo editing in my iPhone. But very disappointed, I lost some in-app purchases after upgrading to the latest release. Not much support is provided by the developer.

entry.title: Crash and force quit
entry.content: I used to use this app for many years and I do love it. But after recent update and I found I just can't open the app anymore coz its force quitted. I tried re-install the app and tried few times already, I'm using iOS 8.3
